page.title: 08Helme,Its School and Church
page.content:
Helme School is a Church of England school.During Lent the children go to church every Wednesday.Every Monday the vicar comes to talk to the children in assembly.After this he goes round the classes and tells them a bible story.
On Sunday the Sunday school have a little time in church then go up to school to talk about God and to learn about Christianity. The school is a church aided school.Once a month the school orchestra plays at Family Service.
The Church use the school for many meetings such as young wives,mothers union and choir practice. The church has dry rot and it will cost Â£12,000 to repair the damage.
